Class: RedisServer

RedisServer

Start and stop a local Redis server like a boss.

Constructor

new RedisServer(configOrPortopt)

Construct a new RedisServer.
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
configOrPort Number | String | RedisServer~Config <optional>
 A number or string that is a port or an object for configuration.

(readonly) isClosing :Boolean

Determine if the instance is closing a Redis server; true while a process is being, or about to be, killed until the contained Redis server either closes or errs.
Type:
  • Boolean
Source:
  • RedisServer.js, line 364

(readonly) isOpening :Boolean

Determine if the instance is running a Redis server; true once a process has spawned and the contained Redis server is ready to service requests.
Type:
  • Boolean
Source:
  • RedisServer.js, line 382

(readonly) isRunning :Boolean

Determine if the instance is starting a Redis server; true while a process is spawning, or about tobe spawned, until the contained Redis server either starts or errs.

close

Emitted once a Redis server has stopped.
